mapper.select:
select stock_out_order_level2.*, spa.status from stock_out_order_level2 stock_out_order_level2 left join spare_part_stock_info spsi on stock_out_order_level2.custodial_warehouse_code = spsi.warehouse_code and spsi.del_flag = 0 left join spare_part_apply spa on stock_out_order_level2.apply_code=spa.code and spa.del_flag = 0
and stock_out_order_level2.del_flag = 0
and stock_out_order_level2.order_code like concat(concat('%',#{condition.orderCode}),'%')
and spsi.warehouse_name like concat(concat('%',#{condition.warehouseName}),'%')
and Date(stock_out_order_level2.out_time) >= #{condition.outTimeBegin} and Date(stock_out_order_level2.out_time) <= #{condition.outTimeEnd}
order by stock_out_order_level2.create_time desc
